title: What is this chat dc
body: Why does the game always dc me from chat it's rather annoying since i wanna play with my friends but can't :(

replies.body: There were some intermittent issues with the chat service around the time you posted this that have since been resolved. Are you still encountering this issue?

Hello,
I believe there was some issue yesterday on EUNE. You can keep an eye on server status pages when something abnormal happens:
https://status.leagueoflegends.com/#eune
https://twitter.com/status_lol
